Label: R.B.C.
Comment: CMO only has RBC for blood samples

Label: W.B.C.
Comment: CMO only has WBC for blood samples

Label: Bacteria
Comment: No check for bacteria, though HP does have a term for 'bacteria in urine'. I think looking at the measurement is better here though

Label: Uric acid
Comment: CMO only has blood uric acid

Label: Vitamin C
